options.title: -c columns
options.description: Output is formatted for a display columns wide.

options.title: -s sep
options.description: Specify a set of characters to delimit columns for the -t option. It defaults to space and tab.

options.title: -t
options.description: Table mode. Each input line provides the text for one output row. It is split into cells using the -s option. Leading, trailing, and multiple adjacent delimiters are ignored. Each column is as wide as the widest cell in it. Columns are separated by two spaces.
